children.tooltip: //The registered address received from MCA API has to be stored into the 7 stored values vayCrRegAddr1, vayCrRegAddr2, vayCrRegCity vayCrRegDistrict, vayCrRegState, vayCrRegCountry //

children.text: Select the address for which address proof can be provided in form of Water Bill/ Telephone Bill/ Electricity Bill or Property or Municipal tax receipt copy.
